**Example 1: 请求示例**



Input: 

```
tccli eiam CreateUserGroup --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DisplayName 示例用户组 \
    --Description 示例用户组的备注
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "662cdc36-****-490a-a750-f92503baaf8c",
        "UserGroupId": "1453013c-****-424b-b9c7-dabcea3bd0ca"
    }
}
```
